channel.title: Help please
channel.description: whenever i change the price of an item in my item.cfg it gets multiplied by 126875 any1 know what the problem could be :confused:

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I am ghetto, doesn’t mean I’m different from everyone else.

Search:

public double GetItemShopValue

The decimal would your concern here. Change it to 1. Go to item.cfg

The second number, following the “description” of the item, would be your target for attack, you change to the exact value without the need to multiply.

Read full topic
